def minimize_total_price(n, k, items):
    stools = []
    pencils = []
    for i in range(n):
        (price, item_type) = items[i]
        if item_type == 1:
            stools.append((price, i + 1))
        else:
            pencils.append((price, i + 1))
    if k >= len(stools):
        l = k - len(stools) - 1
        total_price = sum((price for (price, idx) in stools)) / 2 + sum((price for (price, idx) in pencils))
        cart_distributions = [['1', str(idx)] for (price, idx) in stools]
        cart_distributions.extend([['1', str(idx)] for (price, idx) in pencils[:l]])
        cart_distributions.append([str(len(pencils) - l)] + [str(idx) for (price, idx) in pencils[l:]])
    else:
        stools.sort(reverse=True)
        pencils.sort()
        total_price = sum((price for (price, idx) in stools[:k - 1])) / 2 + sum((price for (price, idx) in stools[k - 1:])) + sum((price for (price, idx) in pencils)) - min((price for (price, idx) in pencils + stools[k - 1:])) / 2
        cart_distributions = [['1', str(idx)] for (price, idx) in stools[:k - 1]]
        remaining_items = [str(idx) for (price, idx) in stools[k - 1:]] + [str(idx) for (price, idx) in pencils]
        cart_distributions.append([str(len(remaining_items))] + remaining_items)
    total_price = round(total_price, 1)
    return (total_price, cart_distributions)
